nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会办公厅

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会办公厅
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会办公厅
中央军事委员会办公厅
中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会办公厅
中共中央军事委员会办公厅
中华人民共和国国防部办公厅

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区复兴路7号八一大楼
location.en: Bayi Building, 7 Fuxing Road, Haidian District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的日常办事机构，是中央军委机关第一级职能部门。该机构与中华人民共和国中央军事委员会办公厅为“一个机构两块牌子”。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Military Commission, and a primary functional department of the CMC organs. It operates under the name 'General Office of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China' as part of the 'one institution with two names' system.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国武装力量的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest national military command and control institution of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，现任中央军事委员会办公厅主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the PLA Ground Force, currently serving as the Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，现任中央军事委员会办公厅副主任。
description.en: A major general in the PLA Ground Force, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区复兴路7号

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的办公所在地。
description.en: The headquarters of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 北京市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: A district of the municipality of Beijing.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会
en: Discipline Inspection Commission of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的纪律检查机构。
description.en: The disciplinary inspection body of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中央军委纪委监委驻军委办公厅纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央军委纪委监委驻军委办公厅纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 由中央军委纪委监委派驻至中央军委办公厅的纪律检查和监察小组。
description.en: The discipline inspection and supervision group dispatched by the CMC Discipline Inspection Commission to the General Office of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾主持中央军委工作。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who once presided over the work of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理，曾主持中央军委工作。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China, who once presided over the work of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任中央军委秘书长。
description.en: A Senior General of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: General Staff Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中央军事委员会的军事工作机关，在2016年军队改革中被撤销。
description.en: Formerly the military affairs organ of the Central Military Commission, it was abolished in the 2016 military reform.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，长期担任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army who served as the Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission for a long period.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部办公厅

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部办公厅

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军总参谋部的下属机构，曾一度兼为中央军委办公厅。
description.en: A former subordinate body of the PLA General Staff Department, which also served concurrently as the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

en: Deepening national defense and military reform

description.zh-cn: 2015年起由中央军委主席习近平推动的中国人民解放军的全面改革。
description.en: A comprehensive reform of the People's Liberation Army promoted by Xi Jinping, Chairman of the Central Military Commission, starting in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委办公厅内设机构之一，负责服务中央军委主席。
description.en: An internal department of the General Office of the Central Military Commission, responsible for serving the Chairman of the CMC.

nodes.id: 中央军委办公厅政治工作局

zh-cn: 中央军委办公厅政治工作局

description.zh-cn: 中央军委办公厅内设机构之一。
description.en: An internal department of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中央军委办公厅秘书局

zh-cn: 中央军委办公厅秘书局

description.zh-cn: 中央军委办公厅内设机构之一。
description.en: An internal department of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中央军委办公厅保密和档案局

zh-cn: 中央军委办公厅保密和档案局

description.zh-cn: 中央军委办公厅内设机构之一。
description.en: An internal department of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 指1968年3月24日杨成武、余立金、傅崇碧受批判免职的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event on March 24, 1968, where Yang Chengwu, Yu Lijin, and Fu Chongbi were criticized and dismissed from their posts.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会办公厅主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the General Office of the Central People's Revolutionary Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会办公厅主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central People's Revolutionary Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾代理中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会办公厅主任。
description.en: A major general of the PLA, who served as acting Director of the General Office of the Central People's Revolutionary Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾兼代中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A general of the PLA, who concurrently served as acting Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A major general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军人物，曾任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A figure in the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军人物，曾任中央军委办公厅副主任并主持工作。
description.en: A figure in the PLA, former Deputy Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission who presided over its work.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾兼任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, who concurrently served as Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，曾任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: An admiral of the PLA Navy, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, former Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中央军委办公厅副主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, former Deputy Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，曾任中央军委办公厅副主任。
description.en: A major general of the PLA Ground Force, former Deputy Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，曾任中央军委办公厅副主任。
description.en: A major general of the PLA Ground Force, former Deputy Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，现任中央军委办公厅副主任。
description.en: A major general of the PLA, currently serving as Deputy Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，现任中央军委办公厅副主任。
description.en: A major general of the PLA, currently serving as Deputy Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军少将，中央军委纪委监委驻军委办公厅纪检监察组组长。
description.en: A major general of the PLA Air Force, head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group dispatched by the CMC Discipline Inspection Commission to the General Office of the CMC.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央军事委员会办公厅
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会办公厅是中央军事委员会的日常办事机构。
description.en: The General Office of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China is the administrative body of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中央军委纪委监委驻军委办公厅纪检监察组
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央军委纪委监委驻军委办公厅纪检监察组是由中央军委纪委监委派驻的纪检监察机构。
description.en: The Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group in the CMC General Office is a body dispatched by the CMC Discipline Inspection Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央军事委员会办公厅

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中，调整组建了新的中央军委办公厅。
description.en: During the deepening of national defense and military reform, a new General Office of the Central Military Commission was adjusted and established.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央军事委员会办公厅
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

description.zh-cn: 在此期间，中央军委办公厅成为总参谋部的二级部，由总参谋部办公厅兼管。
description.en: During this period, the General Office of the Central Military Commission became a second-level department of the General Staff Department, administered concurrently by the General Office of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 路扬

description.zh-cn: 路扬在“三二四事件”中被免去中央军委办公厅主任职务。
description.en: Lu Yang was dismissed from his position as Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission during the 'March 24th Incident'.

relationships.target: 周恩来

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀接替周恩来主持中央军委的工作。
description.en: Peng Dehuai succeeded Zhou Enlai in presiding over the work of the Central Military Commission.
